    • 方法详细资料

      • send

        public <T> T send(PaymentTransactionType transType,
         HttpMethod httpMethod,
         PlayerAccountHttpHeader httpHeaders,
         com.google.protobuf.Message entity,
         org.apache.http.client.ResponseHandler<T> responseHandler,
         ReversalHandler<T> reversalHandler)
       throws java.io.IOException
        All requests issued by a single instance of HttpClient share the same URI.
        参数:
        transType - THe transaction type.
        httpMethod - Http request method.
        httpHeaders - The headers definition of HTTP.
        entity - THe entity which will be attached to HTTP message.
        responseHandler - THe handler which is responsible of handling response.
        返回:
        a response determined by handler.
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException - if connection failed.

      • send

        public <T> T send(PaymentTransactionType transType,
         java.net.URI uri,
         HttpMethod httpMethod,
         PlayerAccountHttpHeader httpHeaders,
         com.google.protobuf.Message entity,
         org.apache.http.client.ResponseHandler<T> responseHandler,
         ReversalHandler<T> reversalHandler)
       throws java.io.IOException,
              org.apache.http.client.ClientProtocolException
        Executes a request to the target using the given context and processes the response using the given response handler.
        参数:
        transType - The transaction type defined by PaymentTransactionType .
        uri - The target URI.
        httpMethod - THe http method defined by HttpMethod
        httpHeaders - THe customized HTTP headers.
        entity - THe HTTP entity.
        responseHandler - A handler which is responsible of handling response.
        reversalHandler - A handler which trigger reversal once fail to read response data(read timeout).
        返回:
        A appropriate response instance which is determined by ResponseHandler
        抛出:
        org.apache.http.client.ClientProtocolException - in case of an http protocol error
        java.io.IOException - in case of a problem or the connection was aborted
